tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Dear) (NNS men)) (VP (VP (ADVP (RB here)) (VBZ 's) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ useful) (NN piece)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN advice))))) (: :) (S (VP (VB Avoid) (NP (NN woman) (NNP Anger)) (PP (IN !!)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [piece/NN nsubj>[men/NNS compound>Dear/NNP] advmod>here/RB cop>'s/VBZ det>a/DT amod>useful/JJ nmod:of>[advice/NN case>of/IN] punct>:/: ccomp>[Avoid/VB dobj>[Anger/NNP compound>woman/NN] nmod>!!/IN]]
